chapters.title: Chapter 4: Summoned
chapters.info: Gawyn Trakand, p. 51 (46)—Brother to Elayne. He will become the First Prince of the Sword when Elayne becomes queen of Andor. Both he and his half-brother, Galad, are strikingly handsome. See also Damodred, Galadedrid; Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Morgase.
